title: Arbalest
data:
{{version031}} {{weapon |name = Arbalest |weight = 15.0 |skill = Crossbows |damage = 16 |accuracy = -2 |basedelay = 19 (190%) |mindelay = 10 at 18 skill |hands = 2H |size = Medium |ranged = Yes |acquirement = 10 }} {{flavour|A large piece of machinery used for firing bolts, braced with steel and cranked with a windlass. It takes some time to load and fire. ---- "(TELL enters with his crossbow)
W. TELL:
My precious jewel now, -my chiefest treasure-
A mark I'll set thee, which the cry of grief
Could never penetrate,-but thou shalt pierce it-
And thou, my trusty bowstring, that so oft
For sport hath served me faithfully and well
Desert me not in this dread hour of need,-
Only be true this once, my own good cord,
That hast so often wing'd the biting shaft:-
For shouldst thou fly successless from my hand,
I have no second to send after thee." -Friedrich Schiller, _Wilhelm Tell_, IV, iii. 1804.
trans. Sir Theodore Martin, 1898.}} {{crawlquote|This weapon falls into the '[[Ranged Weapons]]' category. It is a two-handed weapon.}} '''Arbalests''' are moderately powerful [[ranged weapon]]s. They have a high damage per hit, but fire slowly, with a [[mindelay]] of 1.0 turn (rather than 0.7 turn of most weapons). ==Strategy== Arbalests are a mid-game ranged weapon. They are occasionally found on [[list of orcs|orcs]] and [[naga sharpshooter]]s, and often found on [[yaktaur]]s inside [[the Vaults]]. [[Longbow]]s, due to their faster fire rate, will generally beat arbalests for damage per turn. If you want to go heavier, [[triple crossbow]]s are your end goal. If you want more defenses, [[hand cannon]]s are just as strong, but allow the use of a [[shield]]. {| class="prettytable" style="border:none; margin:auto; padding:0; text-align: center" ! || Image |- | '''Mundane''' || [[File:arbalest1.png]] |- | '''Magical''' || [[File:arbalest2.png]] |- | '''Artifact''' || [[File:arbalest3.png]] |- ! || [[Unrandart]]
arbalest |- | '''[[Damnation (unrand)|Damnation]]''' || [[File:Urand damnation.png]] |} ==History== *Prior to [[0.30]], arbalests had 17 damage. *In [[0.29]], arbalests' stats were nerfed (previously: 18 damage, +2 accuracy) and they were affected by the [[Ranged Weapons#History|ranged weapons rework]] that applied to all launchers, including the removal of the dedicated [[Crossbows (skill)|crossbows skill]] and physical [[bolt]]s necessary to fire. *Prior to [[0.15]], [[Crossbows]] only contained one type of weapon called the [[Crossbow (item)|crossbow]]. They were split into arbalests, [[hand crossbow]]s, and [[triple crossbow]]s. {{weapons}} [[Category:Crossbows]]
